data.name: Defiance: Castithan Charge Pack
data.detailed_description:
Buy the first DLC pack for Defiance to play as a Castithan and use charged weapons as seen in the hit TV show. Further customize your Ark Hunter with new appearance options, complete new Story Mission Lines, and get access to new Pursuits. Set yourself apart with the Castithan Charge Pack!

Key Features:
  • Convert your existing character to the Castithan species or any other playable race
  • Play new Sieges where you compete with Volge enemies for valuable resources
  • Access new Battle Arenas and earn a Castithan Blade reward
  • Unique version of the Raptor 4 player truck
  • Unique Castithan outfit
  • Charge Weapons Pack: Shotgun and Pistol
  • Access new Pursuits
  • And much more….

For more information on Defiance visit http://www.Defiance.com
http://www.facebook.com/Defiance
http://www.twitter.com/DefianceGame

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce 8600, ATI Radeon HD 2900, or Intel HD 4000 integrated graphics or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 or ATI Radeon HD 4750 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
